profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.1.3 File trailer - EOF
profile.description: No data shall follow the last end-of-file marker except a single optional end-of-line marker.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: No data shall follow the last end-of-file marker except a single optional end-of-line marker.

error.message: Data is present after the last end-of-file marker
